comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content:
Again, two quite similar images on your stream:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/usnationalarchives/4309059837/]

Why did you choose to upload both?

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content: BigBean, You asked about why we uploaded photos that were similar to each other from this series of Ansel Adams photographs. A little background: Archivists from the still pictures unit originally selected which images from this series of Ansel Adams photographs would be digitized in the late 1990s. These photos have been available in our online catalog (the Archival Research Catalog, or ARC www.archives.gov/research/arc/) for years. For this Flickr set, our Flickr team just decided to post all of the photos that had been digitized from this series, believing that they were all worth sharing. Thanks, Jill (U.S. National Archives)

comment.author: 95859379@N00
comment._content: And thank you for doing so!
